Extended Control

perm_data_settingchat_bubble_outline
HomeForm ComponetsExtended Control

Extended Control

Extended controls includes very handly input types, which extend you input paramters. These will expand your choice of input parameter while you develope an application.

Masked Input

jquery.maskedinput.js is being used for this extended control over the input. Add masked-input/jquery.maskedinput.js to your page and design your requirement to be performed. It's so easy.

$("#intl-tel").intlTelInput();. We can effectively manage mobile numbers with country code with intl-tel-input.


<div class="row">
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="masked-date1"/>
		<label for="masked-date1">Date</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="masked-phone" class="phone"/>
		<label for="masked-phone">Phone</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="masked-phoneExt"/>
		<label for="masked-phoneExt">PhoneExt</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="masked-iphone"/>
		<label for="masked-iphone">iPhone</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="masked-tin"/>
		<label for="masked-tin">Tin</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="masked-ssn"/>
		<label for="masked-ssn">ssn</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="masked-product"/>
		<label for="masked-product">product</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="masked-eyescript"/>
		<label for="masked-eyescript">eyescriptpo</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="masked-po"/>
		<label for="masked-po">po</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="masked-pct"/>
		<label for="masked-pct">pct</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="masked-phoneAutoclearFalse"/>
		<label for="masked-phoneAutoclearFalse">phoneAutoclearFalse</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="masked-phoneExtAutoclearFalse"/>
		<label for="masked-phoneExtAutoclearFalse">phoneExtAutoclearFalse</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m12 l12">
		<input type="number" id="intl-tel" name="myphone"/>
	</div>
</div>
Typeahead.JS

When initializing a typeahead using the Typeahead jQuery plugin, you pass the plugin method one or more datasets. The source of a dataset is responsible for computing a set of suggestions for a given query.

Basic feature: Bring the states of USA.
Prefetched data is fetched and processed on initialization. If the browser supports local storage, the processed data will be cached there to prevent additional network requests on subsequent page loads.
Remote data is only used when the data provided by local and prefetch is insufficient. In order to prevent an obscene number of requests being made to the remote endpoint, requests are rate-limited.
Custom templates give you full control over how suggestions get rendered making it easy to customize the look and feel of your typeahead.
Default suggestions can be shown for empty queries by setting the minLength option to 0 and having the source return suggestions for empty queries.
Bring set of data.
Scrollable Dropdown Menu
RTL Support 

<div class="row">
	<div id="the-basics" class="input-field col s12 m6 informatic-input">
		<input type="text" placeholder="States of USA" id="StatesofUSA" class="typeahead box-input"/><span class="input-info">Basic feature: Bring the states of USA.</span>
	</div>
	<div id="prefetch" class="input-field col s12 m6 informatic-input">
		<input type="text" placeholder="Countries" id="Countries" class="typeahead box-input"/><span class="input-info">Prefetched data is fetched and processed on initialization. If the browser supports local storage, the processed data will be cached there to prevent additional network requests on subsequent page loads.</span>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
	<div id="remote" class="input-field col s12 m6 informatic-input">
		<input type="text" placeholder="Oscar winners for Best Picture" id="remote-input" class="typeahead box-input"/><span class="input-info">Remote data is only used when the data provided by local and prefetch is insufficient. In order to prevent an obscene number of requests being made to the remote endpoint, requests are rate-limited.</span>
	</div>
	<div id="custom-templates" class="input-field col s12 m6 informatic-input">
		<input type="text" placeholder="Oscar winners for Best Picture" id="custom-templates-input" class="typeahead box-input"/><span class="input-info">Custom templates give you full control over how suggestions get rendered making it easy to customize the look and feel of your typeahead.</span>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
	<div id="default-suggestions" class="input-field col s12 m6 informatic-input">
		<input type="text" placeholder="NFL Teams" id="default-suggestions-input" class="typeahead box-input"/><span class="input-info">Default suggestions can be shown for empty queries by setting the minLength option to 0 and having the source return suggestions for empty queries.</span>
	</div>
	<div id="multiple-datasets" class="input-field col s12 m6 informatic-input">
		<input type="text" placeholder="NBA and NHL teams" id="multiple-datasets-input" class="typeahead box-input"/><span class="input-info">Bring set of data.</span>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
	<div id="scrollable-dropdown-menu" class="input-field col s12 m6 informatic-input">
		<input type="text" placeholder="Countries" id="scrollable-dropdown-menu-input" class="typeahead box-input"/><span class="input-info">Scrollable Dropdown Menu</span>
	</div>
	<div id="rtl-support" class="input-field col s12 m6 informatic-input">
		<input type="text" placeholder="نعم" id="rtl-support-input" dir="rtl" class="typeahead box-input"/><span class="input-info">RTL Support</span>
	</div>
</div>
Formatter

Format user input to match a specified pattern.Formatter provide extensive feature which refines user inputs.

Output: 4111-1111-1111-1111
Output: (802) 415-3411
Output: 99/99/9999
Output: (999) 999-9999 / a999
Output: $999.99
Output: +39 999 999 999
Output: 99 - 9999999
Output: 999 - 99 - 9999
Output: a* - 999 - a999
Output: aaa - 999 - ***
Output: 999 - 99 - 999 - 9999 - 9
Output: +3 (999) 999-99-99 

<div class="row">
	<div id="the-basics" class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" placeholder="Enter crdit card" id="credit-input" pattern="d*" maxlength="19" class="input box-input"/>
		<label for="credit-input">Credit Card</label>
	</div>
	<div id="the-basics" class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" placeholder="Phone" id="phone-input" pattern="d*" maxlength="19" class="input box-input"/>
		<label for="phone-input">Phone</label>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
	<div id="the-basics" class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" placeholder="Enter starting date" id="format-date" class="input box-input"/>
		<label for="format-date">Enter starting date</label>
	</div>
	<div id="the-basics" class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" placeholder="Enter your phone number" id="format-phone-ext" class="input box-input"/>
		<label for="format-phone-ext">Enter your phone number</label>
	</div>
</div>

Num-Box

NumBox aims to work equally well on desktops and mobile devices, and helps ensure that a numeric keyboard will pop-up on mobile devices when a number is entered. It offers both real-time validation as you type plus display formatting, and has a lot of customization options.

jquery.numbox-1.2.0/jquery.numbox-1.2.0.min.js and jquery.numbox-1.2.0/jquery.numbox-1.2.0.css needs to be added to your scripting list and CSS list.


<div class="row">
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="inputJPY" value="10"/>
		<label for="inputJPY">Japanese Yen</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="inputUSD" value="10"/>
		<label for="inputUSD">USD</label>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="inputCNY"/>
		<label for="inputCNY">Chinese Yuan</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="chlorine"/>
		<label for="chlorine">Atomic Radius</label>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="inputSSN" value="023456789" class="NumBox"/>
		<label for="inputSSN">Social Security #</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="credcard" value="4111111111111111" class="NumBox"/>
		<label for="credcard">Credit Card</label>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6">
		<input type="text" id="amexcard" value="378282246310005" class="NumBox"/>
		<label for="amexcard">American Express Card</label>
	</div>
</div>
Password Generator

Password generator will provide you random passwords.

refresh
refresh
refresh
refresh
refresh 

<div class="row">
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6 pass-gen">
		<input type="text" rel="gp" data-size="32" data-character-set="a-z,A-Z,0-9,#" id="input-lg1" class="input-lg validate box-input"/>
		<label for="input-lg1">Password : Using all of the character sets</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6 pass-gen">
		<input type="text" rel="gp" data-size="32" data-character-set="a-z,A-Z" id="input-lg2" class="input-lg validate box-input"/>
		<label for="input-lg2">Password : Using both the a-z and A-Z character sets</label>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6 pass-gen">
		<input type="text" rel="gp" data-size="32" data-character-set="a-z" id="input-lg3" class="input-lg validate box-input"/>
		<label for="input-lg3">Password : Using a-z character set</label>
	</div>
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6 pass-gen">
		<input type="text" rel="gp" data-size="32" data-character-set="A-Z" id="input-lg4" class="input-lg validate box-input"/>
		<label for="input-lg4">Password : Using A-Z character sets</label>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="row">
	<div class="input-field col s12 m6 pass-gen">
		<input type="text" rel="gp" data-size="12" data-character-set="0-9" id="input-lg5" class="input-lg validate box-input"/>
		<label for="input-lg5">Password : Using 0-9 character set</label>
	</div>
</div>
